title: Aarakocra (Race)
excerpt: A winged people from the Elemental Plane of Air, aarakocra soar through the sky, commanding echoes of their ancestors' power over wind.

title: Aasimar (Race)
excerpt: Mortals infused with celestial power, aasimar possess divine traits like healing touch, light generation, and transformative revelations, reflecting their angelic heritage.

title: Bugbear (Race)
excerpt: Hulking cousins of goblins, bugbears are quiet skulkers with a fey gift for lurking, enhanced reach, and the ability to deal a devastating surprise attack.

title: Centaur (Race)
excerpt: Hailing from the Feywild, centaurs have the upper body of an elf and the lower body of a horse, combining natural speed with a mystical connection to the wild.

title: Changeling (Race)
excerpt: With ever-changing appearances, changelings can supernaturally adopt any face they like, channeling either the peril or the joy of their Feywild origins.

title: Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin)
excerpt: Natives of the Underdark, deep gnomes are suffused with subterranean magic, allowing them to camouflage themselves and resist magical effects.

title: Dragonborn (Race)
excerpt: Dragonborn are proud, honorable humanoids descended from dragons, known for their draconic ancestry which grants them a breath weapon and damage resistance.

title: Duergar (Race)
excerpt: Dwarves transformed by centuries in the Underdark, duergar possess psionic powers and innate magic allowing them to enlarge or turn invisible.

title: Dwarf (Race)
excerpt: Stout and resilient folk from mountainous realms, known for their skill in smithing, mining, and their deep connection to stone and metal.

title: Eladrin (Race)
excerpt: Elves of the Feywild, eladrin can teleport with a fey step and resonate with the emotions of the seasons, altering their mood and abilities.

title: Elf (Race)
excerpt: A magical people of otherworldly grace, elves live long lives, possess keen senses, and have a deep connection to the Feywild. They are known for their distinct lineages: Drow, High Elf, and Wood Elf.

subEntries.title: Drow Lineage
subEntries.excerpt: Descended from elves of the Underdark, drow possess superior darkvision and unique innate magic.

subEntries.title: High Elf Lineage
subEntries.excerpt: Heirs to elves infused with the magic of the Feywild, high elves are naturally adept at arcane arts.

subEntries.title: Wood Elf Lineage
subEntries.excerpt: Embodying the spirit of primeval forests, wood elves are swift, perceptive, and have a primal connection to nature.

title: Fairy (Race)
excerpt: A wee folk from the Feywild, fairies are infused with its magic, granting them insectile wings for flight and innate magical abilities.

title: Firbolg (Race)
excerpt: Distant cousins of giants, firbolgs are forest-dwellers with obscuring magic that allows them to turn invisible and speak with beasts and plants.

title: Genasi (Race)
excerpt: Tracing their ancestry to the genies of the Elemental Planes, each genasi can tap into the power of one of the four elements: air, earth, fire, and water.

subEntries.title: Air Genasi
subEntries.excerpt: Descended from djinn, Air Genasi embody the airy traits of their ancestors, with an affinity for wind and lightning.

subEntries.title: Earth Genasi
subEntries.excerpt: Inheriting steadfast strength from their dao ancestors, Earth Genasi can traverse difficult terrain with ease and magically merge with stone.

subEntries.title: Fire Genasi
subEntries.excerpt: Descended from efreet, Fire Genasi channel the destructive nature of flame, with skin tones of charcoal and red and hair like threads of fire.

subEntries.title: Water Genasi
subEntries.excerpt: Descended from marids, Water Genasi are suited to life underwater, carrying the power of the waves and possessing acid resistance and the ability to breathe water.

title: Githyanki (Race)
excerpt: Hailing from the Astral Plane, Githyanki are psionic warriors who escaped servitude to mind flayers, using their mental powers and knowledge of the silver void.

title: Githzerai (Race)
excerpt: Disciplined monks who carved a home from the chaos of Limbo, Githzerai use their potent psionic power to protect themselves and probe the minds of others.

title: Gnome (Race)
excerpt: Magical folk known for their cleverness, illusions, and invention. Gnomes have distinct lineages: Forest Gnome and Rock Gnome, granting unique abilities.

subEntries.title: Forest Gnome
subEntries.excerpt: Forest gnomes have a natural knack for illusion and inherent quickness, often dwelling in wooded burrows.

subEntries.title: Rock Gnome
subEntries.excerpt: Rock gnomes are the most common type of gnome, known for their natural inventiveness, hardiness, and tinkering.

title: Goblin (Race)
excerpt: A subterranean folk with fey origins, goblins use their supernatural knack for finding weak spots and their Nimble Escape to survive and thrive.

title: Goliath (Race)
excerpt: Distant descendants of giants, goliaths are towering humanoids who can manifest supernatural boons from their giant ancestry and temporarily grow to Large size.

subEntries.title: Cloud's Jaunt (Cloud Giant)
subEntries.excerpt: A Giant Ancestry boon allowing magical teleportation as a Bonus Action.

subEntries.title: Fire's Burn (Fire Giant)
subEntries.excerpt: A Giant Ancestry boon allowing you to deal extra Fire damage on a successful attack.

subEntries.title: Frost's Chill (Frost Giant)
subEntries.excerpt: A Giant Ancestry boon allowing you to deal extra Cold damage and reduce an enemy's speed.

subEntries.title: Hill's Tumble (Hill Giant)
subEntries.excerpt: A Giant Ancestry boon allowing you to knock an enemy Prone on a successful attack.

subEntries.title: Stone's Endurance (Stone Giant)
subEntries.excerpt: A Giant Ancestry boon allowing you to use your Reaction to reduce incoming damage.

subEntries.title: Storm's Thunder (Storm Giant)
subEntries.excerpt: A Giant Ancestry boon allowing you to deal reactive Thunder damage to an attacker.
